items.sentence: Tom lowered his voice and told Mary that he loved her.
Tom made me promise not to tell Mary his phone number.
Tom makes his own original Christmas cards every year.
Tom married someone who was in prison for three years.
You should consult a doctor if the symptoms get worse.
You should know better than to talk back to your boss.
You should not judge a person by his appearance alone.
You should probably tell Tom when he needs to be here.
Tom couldn\'t imagine that Mary would really say that.
Tom couldn\'t persuade Mary to buy a present for John.
Tom shared a large number of ideas with the committee.
Tom should apologize to Mary for not arriving on time.
Tom spends a lot of time helping Mary do her homework.
Tom asked me to tell you he needed a little more time.
Tom began to open the present that Mary had given him.
Tom isn\'t able to always brush his teeth after meals.
Tom isn\'t currently collecting unemployment benefits.
Tom likes golf, but Mary thinks it\'s slow and boring.
Tom said he\'d wash the dishes, so you don\'t have to.
I\'m beginning to suspect that isn\'t going to happen.
